frontend.message: Code quality fixes applied, performance optimizations ready
frontend.last_result: Fixed critical ESLint errors, type checking verified, component optimizations ready

backend.message: Missing controllers implemented, API infrastructure complete
backend.last_result: Implemented comments, photos, and notifications controllers with full CRUD operations, modernized routes, and verified server functionality

api.message: Comprehensive authentication and data modeling enhancements implemented
api.last_result: Implemented advanced rate limiting, security headers, 2FA system, API versioning, and database optimizations

styling.message: Responsive design and accessibility optimizations complete
styling.last_result: Implemented responsive design improvements, accessibility enhancements, reduced motion support, loading states, and smooth animations. CSS bundle: 93.92kb (compressed: 14.06kb).

testing.message: Comprehensive E2E testing and code quality assurance completed
testing.last_result: Reviewed enhancements, ran ESLint/TypeScript checks (fixed 15 errors), configured Playwright with Rumfor-specific tests covering authentication, market browsing, vendor workflows, responsive design, and error states

security.message: Comprehensive security audit completed with critical findings
security.last_result: Conducted vulnerability scans, audited authentication systems, validated API security, checked OWASP compliance, updated security reports, and identified critical credential management issues

documentation.last_result: Created database schema docs, API documentation, component library props, deployment guides, and updated all project documentation with enterprise-level coverage
